nodes.text: John Cygan (April 27, 1953 – May 13, 2017) was an American actor, voice artist and comedian who had done the voice of Dash Rendar in Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire, Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance and Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds as well as Rand Talor in that game. Cygan had also provided the voice of Luke Skywalker and Darth Vader in the Dark Empire, Dark Empire II and Empire's End audio dramatizations; Canderous Ordo/Mandalore the Preserver in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic and Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords; and Ulic Qel-Droma in the Dark Lords of the Sith audio dramatization, along with a host of other minor characters. Outside of Star Wars projects, Cygan was also well known for providing the voice of Solidus Snake in Hideo Kojima's Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty.
